extends AbstractRepository

    • Method Detail

      • findAllByForum

        public java.util.List<Thread> findAllByForum(java.lang.Integer forumId)
        Queries the database for all the Thread objects with foreign key for one Forum.
        Parameters:
        forumId - is passed in by the Service.
        Returns:
        returns an ArrayList of all the Thread objects instantiated with the ResultSet.

      • findById

        public Thread findById(java.lang.Integer id)
        Query the database for one Thread by id.
        Specified by:
        findById in interface Repository<Thread,java.lang.Integer>
        Parameters:
        id - is passed in by the service.
        Returns:
        returns one Thread instantiated from the ResultSet.

      • save

        public Thread save(Thread thread)
        We query the database and insert a new row into the Users table.
        Specified by:
        save in interface Repository<Thread,java.lang.Integer>
        Parameters:
        thread - is passed in by the Service. We read each property of the thread with Getters and write those values into the preparedStatement's query.
        Returns:
        return the saved thread object after we set the id of the thread that the database generated.
